TopicTitle: Does the Unofficial B9 Aerospace REPACK come fully loaded?

Articles.Content:
I been playing stock KSP for a some time and wanted to play the B9 mod. Installed and everthing doesn't seem to be there is the how the mod is now or am I missing something? I'm playing the 0.24.2 version

Edited August 28, 2014 by Dr_Von_Boom

Can you please rephrase that second last sentence. I can't make sense of it.

Where did you extract the files? You should drop the full contents of the "GameData" folder from the mod (b9_r4_patched-0.24.2.zip\b9_r4_patched-0.24.2\GameData) into the "GameData" folder in your KSP install folder.
Sorry I'm a lousy typist. but I did drop the gamedata file into gamedata file but I thought it had cargobays that open stuff other goodies?
I have put the gamedata file into the gamedata file in the KSP directory got some cockpits and alot of engine parts and some odd things. I thought this had a cargo bay with it?

I been playing stock KSP for a some time and wanted to play the B9 mod. Installed and everthing doesn't seem to be there is the how the mod is now or am I missing something? I'm playing the 0.24.2 version

why use the unofficial B9 repack from curse when you can use the official B9 pack for 0.24.2 ? The repack was only need until the official version was in work/at that time noone was working on

B9 newest version
